overview.en: ROT is the digital rights and interests token issued by Bitrou exchange based on the ERC-20 of Ethereum and serves as an important asset rights and interests token in ROT ecological community. ROT is issued in fixed amounts of 10 billion yuan and will never be issued in new ones.
overview.zh: Bitrou Token是bitrou（以下简称ROT）生态社区内发行的数字资产权益通证，生态系统包括加密数字资产交换以及智能数字钱包支付等体系，致力实现一个以加密数字资产交换和智能钱包支付等多样化为一体的智能加密生态系统。
